Ngati mkazi walandidwa katundu wa mwamuna wake yemwe wamwalira, ali ndi njira zingapo zomwe angatenge kuti ateteze ufulu wake malinga ndi malamulo a Malawi. Atha kupita ku Khoti la Banja kapena Khoti la Chuma kukapempha kuti malo ake abwezedwe, chifukwa Inheritance Act imatsimikizira kuti mkazi ali ndi ufulu wokhala ndi katundu wa mwamuna wake akamwalira. Komanso, Malembo 24(1)  a Malawi Constitution amateteza ufulu wa azimayi pa nkhani za katundu. Mkazi akhoza kupempha thandizo ku mabungwe monga Legal Aid Bureau kapena Women and Law in Southern Africa (WLSA), omwe amathandiza azimayi pazovuta zachuma. Pogwiritsa ntchito malamulo ndi mabungwe awa, mkazi amatha kuimbira mlandu kuphwanyidwa kwa ufulu wake ndikufunafuna chilungamo.

Chapter 4, Section 30, Malamulo a Malawi amateteza anthu wolumala mwa kuwapatsa ufulu ndi chithandizo. Mu Chapter IV, Section 30 ya Malawi Constitution, malamulo amatsimikizira kuti aliyense ali ndi ufulu wothandizidwa. Malamulo a Persons with Disabilities Act (2012) akuwonetsetsa kuti anthu wolumala apeze chithandizo chofunikira. Izi zimathandiza kuti anthu wolumala akhale ndi mwayi mu moyo watsiku ndi tsiku. Mutha kufunsa thandizo ku mabungwe a boma kapena kumakampani a chithandizo.
